attributes.action: ban short selling of shares by hedge funds.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The laws relating to short selling of borrowed  shares should be changed while the country is in recession. The action of government spending  millions to stimulate the economy is undermined by the short selling of shares by hedge funds

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
